attributes.action: Compulsorily purchase the many derelict sites in the UK, some of which are already public buildings, and enable the construction of affordable housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are hundreds, if not thousands, of derelict sites in the Uk, many of which are public buildings with extensive grounds. These should be commandeered and used for low-cost, low rise eco housing around a central building on the site which can also provide accommodation and central services. For more information see ROOFTREE page and ROOFTREE group on Facebook. Only government can make this happen. Change the planning and building regs, and get an army of unemployed construction workers building homes for people!
